name: AbuseIPDB
author: adminelevation
description: A cog to interact with the AbuseIPDB API to check IP addresses for abuse reports.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the AbuseIPDB cog. Use `[p]abuseipdbset setapikey <API_KEY>` to set your API key. Available commands:
- `[p]abuseipdb report` to report an IP address.
- `[p]abuseipdb list <IP>` to list all reports for an IP address.
- `[p]abuseipdb check <IP>` to check details about an IP address.
